keywords_helper: Enter certain keywords/proper nouns you'd want to boost while understanding speech
interrupt_words: Number of words to wait for before interrupting (in words)
interrupt_words_helper: Agent will not consider interruptions until these many words are spoken (If recipient says 'Stopwords' such as Stop, Wait, Hold On, agent will pause by default)
backchanneling_helper: Agent will speak filler words in between sentences to show the recipient that they are listening to them
